name: The King Of Fighters: Rematch
description:
This is The King Of Fighters Fan made.

(It So broken and messy)

Made with Game maker 8.1

It has only 2 playable characters for now.

And needs a lot of fixing.
Controls:-

Up Key----jump

Down Key---Crouch

Left/Right Key----Walk Forward/Backward

Z-Light punch

X-Light kick

C-Strong Punch

V-Strong Kick

1- Open Menu

5/6- Camera Change

Follow me on twitter https://twitter.com/Wanderer816166

Subscribe to my channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKNvDV0bEhTiB5gJVVYGlBQ
